body_html:
@SsnL
I have checked "cudnn.is_acceptable(input.data)" is True when torch.backends.cudnn.enabled is True.
I am using Cudnn LSTM now.

Unfortunately, I can't find any evidence Cudnn LSTM is Type1.
But model parameters and my code for Language Model show that Cudnn LSTM and non-Cudnn LSTM are type 2.
If Cudnn LSTM is type 1, there are redundant parameters. This is very strange.

Can you show me another manuscript or wed document can support the Cudnn LSTM is Type 1 ?
